title: Topic 001 Question 003
body: You need to build a chatbot that meets the following requirements:
✑ Supports chit-chat, knowledge base, and multilingual models
✑ Performs sentiment analysis on user messages
✑ Selects the best language model automatically
What should you integrate into the chatbot?
options: QnA Maker, Language Understanding, and Dispatch
Language Understanding, Text Analytics, and QnA Maker
